com.alibaba.mtc

Class MtContextThreadLocal<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ThreadLocal<T>
      • java.lang.InheritableThreadLocal<T>
        • com.alibaba.mtc.MtContextThreadLocal<T>

  • public class MtContextThreadLocal<T>
extends InheritableThreadLocal<T>
    MtContextThreadLocal can transmit context from the thread of submitting task to the thread of executing task.

    Note: this class extends InheritableThreadLocal, so MtContextThreadLocal first is a InheritableThreadLocal.

    Since:
    0.10.0
    Author:
    ding.lid
    See Also:
    MtContextRunnable, MtContextCallable

    • Constructor Detail

      • MtContextThreadLocal

        public MtContextThreadLocal()

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        protected T copy(T parentValue)
        Computes the context value for this multi-thread context variable as a function of the source thread's value at the time the task Object is created. This method is called from MtContextRunnable or MtContextCallable when it create, before the task is started.

        This method merely returns reference of its source thread value, and should be overridden if a different behavior is desired.

        Since:
        1.0.0
